summary: This is an internal FBI email regarding the production of American Express (AMEX) records related to the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation. An FBI forensic accountant in New York reports that AMEX estimates providing the requested financial records by January 13, 2020.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI
persons.context: The sender of the email, an FBI forensic accountant based at the New York Field Office, who is coordinating the receipt of financial records from American Express for the Maxwell investigation.

events.title: Estimated AMEX Production Date
events.description: American Express estimates it will produce the requested financial records to the FBI.

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: The FBI was actively seeking American Express financial records as part of the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation in January 2020.
A forensic accountant at the FBI's New York Field Office was the point of contact for receiving these records.
American Express estimated a production date of January 13, 2020, for the requested documents.
